name: Checkmate (Supertoady)
description:
Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to move around

Move the mouse to control your warriors

Click to make your warriors attack

How to Play:

You are the king and you command your warriors to fight!

Your warriors will follow your mouse and attack if you click.

The rooks will attack with a short-range slash, and the bishops will attack with a medium-range arrow

If you kill the opposing queen, you win!

But if the queen kills you with their opposing soldiers, you lose.

Made in 3 hours 4 minutes and 3 seconds for the Trijam #185
